Onzzer¶

class Onzzer.Fenetre_principale¶

this is Onzzer’s window

accueil()¶

This fonction create the first page. Include Style

She recuvers the inscription in “LINEedit”.

Returns

She call the “categorie“‘s fonction

Raises

TypeError

Exemple

self.searchButton.clicked.connect(self.categorie)
action_a_propos()¶

This fonction give informations about programmer’s application

action_clear()¶

This function clear th line edith

action_upload(titres)¶

This function allow save all tracks from an album in file .txt

Parameters

param1 (str) – titre

Returns

file .txt

categorie()¶

This fonction call the different fonction between 2 categories.

Returns

If select = Album then “recherche_album” is call, If select = Artiste then “recherche_artiste” is call

Return type

Raises

TypeError

Exemple

select = self.catcombo.currentText()

if select == "Album":
    self.recherche_album(self.line.text())

elif select == "Artiste" :
    self.recherche_artiste(self.line.text())

recherche_artiste(recherche)¶

Code of the table grouping the artists bearing the name sought

He has got a button to retourn in Acceuil and made a new research.

She calls and recover the information returned by the request_artist function She builds with this informations the table.

Parameters

param1 (str) – recherche

Returns

list all artist with same name and their type

Return type

tab

Raises

TypeError

Exemple

recherche_artiste = recherche_artiste(self, "celine dion")

résultat de la receherche céline Dion¶

youtube_search¶

youtube_search.yt_search(self, artiste, titre)¶

This function buil query to lisen a tracks in Youtube (use trask title and singer name )

Parameters

  • param1 (str) – artiste

  • param2 (str) – titre

Returns

build a html link

Return type

str

Raises

TypeError

Example

def yt_search(self, celine Dion, Grand maman):

url_base = "https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query="
url_complet = url_base + celine dion + "+" +  Grand maman
